meanings.sent1: She put on her cozy pantoffles before sitting by the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: I always wear my pantoffles when I'm at home to keep my feet warm.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to steal my pantoffles and play with them.
meanings.sent4: Her pantoffles were like little clouds hugging her feet.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pantoffles had cute pom-poms on them.
